channel.description: Making An Item make you glow until you take item off? How can i accomplish this?

item.title: Making An Item make you glow?
item.dc:creator: @IamMutedAtm IamMutedAtm
item.description:
@IamMutedAtm wrote:

Put these in your boolean process:

[code]
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == ITEM ID && playerRights < 2) {
ownerglow = true;
}

if (adglow == true) {//Admin Glow
stillgfx(246, absY, absX);
}
if (pmodglow == true) {//PMod Glow
stillgfx(247, absY, absX);
}
if (ownerglow2 == true) {//ownerglow2
stillgfx(482, absY, absX);
}
if (ownerglow == true) {//Owner Glow
stillgfx(332, absY, absX);
} [/code]

And and these booleans

public boolean adglow = false;
public boolean pmodglow = false;
public boolean ownerglow = false;
public boolean ownerglow2 = false;

Read full topic
